content.text: Are you a dog or a cat person?
What are the pros and cons of cats and dogs? List the traits and characteristics of each.
Do you have a pet? Would you like to have a pet? Did you grow up with a pet?
Do you have a favorite animal?
Do some people have pets instead of children?
What can children learn from having family pets?
Have you visited a zoo recently? What were your impressions?
Have you ever visited a farm?
What do you think of dogs wearing clothes?
What are some dangerous wild animals in your country?
What is the most interesting animal in your country?
Does your country have a national animal? A national bird?
What's the most unusual animal you've eaten?
What is the most useful animal?
If you could be any animal, what would you choose to be?
Discuss these English-language expressions: he's all bark and no bite / he wouldn't hurt a fly / cry wolf / cheeky monkey / rat race.
Do you have any saying or expressions in your own language which refer to animals?
